name: Little Village Hero
description:
Little Village Hero is a short Fantasy Adventure RPG with turn-based combat. 

Run in full screen mode.

I'm new to game dev and have been developing this RPG for a little over 6 months. This is the first full game I've created, I hope you enjoy playing it!

Note: This is my first time dealing with WebGL and some things ended up a bit wonky. Unfortunately, certain SFX and Shaders are either altered or missing. (ex: Highlight item when you can pick it up!)
